original_title: Hippolyte et Aricie (Opera National de Paris)
overview: Topi Lehtipuu and Anne-Catherine Gillet star in the 2012 Opera National de Paris production of Jean-Philippe Rameau's opera Hippolyte et Aricie.  Also starring Sarah Connolly and Stephane Degout.
title: Hippolyte and Aricie (Paris National Opera)
